title: Google Play Music (Musicolet) Hijacks my music source
content:
Google Pixle 4
Android Auto / SiriusXM / Google Music Player (Musicolet)

I have Android Auto in my phone and my Ford F150. When getting back into the truck, plugging my phone into the dash, it often/always defaults to Google Play Music (Musicolet) and albums on my phone, even though I had last been using SiriusXM for music. I now have to cycle through sources (AM1->AM2->FM1->FM2->etc->Sirius1/2/3) to get back to the SiriusXM Station I had on the last time I was in the truck. This is happening despite not having Musicolet on recently.

I connect to a Bluetooth Speaker. Open the SiriusXM App and start a music channel. A song starts playing. Shortly afterward, Google Play Music switches over to music stored in my phone. Open the phone, restart the paused song I was listening to on the SiriusXM App and it works fine. Just like in the truck, this is happening despite not having Musicolet on recently.

Any help would be appreciated.

John
